title: Videogame Stocks Jump After Microsoft Agrees to Buy Activision Blizzard
sub_head: Electronic Arts, Ubisoft shares rise following the disclosure of the planned deal
body:
Investors piled into videogame stocks Tuesday after Microsoft Corp. said it plans to acquire Activision Blizzard Inc.
Shares of Electronic Arts Inc. added 4.5% to $136.34, on pace for its biggest daily jump since April 2020. U.S.-listed shares of Ubisoft Entertainment SA and Nintendo Co. Ltd. also joined the rally.
